items.desc: This annotation marks the extensions and top-level functions for working with java.nio.file.Path considered experimental.

items.text: fun createTempDirectory( prefix: String? = null, vararg attributes: FileAttribute<*>): Path
items.desc: Creates a new directory in the default temp directory, using the given prefix to generate its name.

items.text: fun createTempDirectory( directory: Path?, prefix: String? = null, vararg attributes: FileAttribute<*>): Path
items.desc: Creates a new directory in the specified directory, using the given prefix to generate its name.

items.text: fun createTempFile( prefix: String? = null, suffix: String? = null, vararg attributes: FileAttribute<*>): Path
items.desc: Creates an empty file in the default temp directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name.

items.text: fun createTempFile( directory: Path?, prefix: String? = null, suffix: String? = null, vararg attributes: FileAttribute<*>): Path
items.desc: Creates an empty file in the specified directory, using the given prefix and suffix to generate its name.
Converts the provided path string to a Path object of the default filesystem.

items.text: fun Path(base: String, vararg subpaths: String): Path
items.desc: Converts the name sequence specified with the base path string and a number of subpaths additional names to a Path object of the default filesystem.
